entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being one of the best men at the Potters' wedding. A map on the wall shows a red pin indicating his location.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as giving Mr. Weasley a sheaf of parchment and asking for information about flying Muggle vehicles.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as receiving a sheaf of parchment from Kingsley and being asked to provide information about flying Muggle vehicles.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving a wink and a whisper from Kingsley, asking him to give Mr. Weasley the magazine.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as possibly using his old motorcycle, according to information received by Kingsley and Mr. Weasley.

relationships.description: Kingsley gave a sheaf of parchment to Mr. Weasley, asking for information about flying Muggle vehicles.
Kingsley asked Harry to give the magazine to Mr. Weasley, saying 'he might find it interesting'.
Mr. Weasley received a sheaf of parchment from Kingsley and was asked to provide information about flying Muggle vehicles.
Kingsley and Mr. Weasley received information that Black might still be using his old motorcycle.
